lead_paragraph: A landscaper, Adam Dobrzanski, 55, was charged with murder in what the police described as a murder-suicide plot.
snippet: A landscaper, Adam Dobrzanski, 55, was charged with murder in what the police described as a murder-suicide plot.

headline.main: Greenwich Man Charged in Fatal Stabbing of His Daughter
